蚻蚻蚻

蚻字的基本解释

蚻
zhá
古书上说的一种像蝉而较小的鸣虫：“及归柳嘶蚻。”

蚻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhá］
［《廣韻》側八切，入黠，莊。］
一种小蝉。

蚻字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚻； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1079第29
【唐韻】【正韻】?側八切，音札。【爾雅·釋蟲】蚻，蜻蜻。【註】如蟬而小。【揚子·方言】蟬其大者謂之蟧，或謂之蝒馬。其小者謂之麥蚻。【孟郊·征蜀聯句】始去杏飛蜂，及歸柳嘶蚻。

蚻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蚻字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Flies
zhá
The ancient book said that it was a small cicada-like cicada: "And Guiliu hissing worm."
Flies
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhá］
["Guangyun" has eight cuts on the side, into the corner, and Zhuang. ]
A small cicada.
Flies
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚻; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1079 29
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Eight cuts on the side, sound note. 【Erya·Release insects】Flies, dragons and dragons. [Note] As small as a cicada. [Yangtze Dialect] The larger cicada is called Zhifang, or called Lei Ma. The smaller one is called the wheat flies. [Mengjiao·Zhengshu Couplet] Begin to go to Xingfeifeng, and Guiliu sizzling.
